title.rendered: Intellectsoft Named a Leading Developer in the UK by Clutch

content.rendered:
Intellectsoft was awarded a spot as a Clutch UK Leader — an annual list of the most highly reviewed companies in the United Kingdom. In November 2017, Intellectsoft has also earned a Clutch Global Leader spot.

This week, Clutch, a ratings and review firm based out of Washington, D.C., released their annual list of the top agencies and developers in the UK. For several years, Intellectsoft has been featured as one of the top development companies in the UK in this rating, and we are proud to earn the spot once again.

To find the leading UK companies, Clutch analyses thousands of businesses in various industries. Then, Clutch categorizes these companies in different lists, ranking them in comparison to similar companies.

This year, Intellectsoft was featured as leaders in six different research segments. This  includes: Top UK Mobile App Developers, Top UK iPhone App Developer, Top Android App Developer, Top UK Custom Software Developers, Top UK Ruby on Rails Developer, Top UK .NET Developers.

Clutch’s UK coverage includes hundreds of companies, and we were named in the top 15 of companies in each of these lists.

Clutch’s differentiating factor is their verified and in-depth client reviews. Dedicated Clutch analysts speak first-hand to a company’s clients to get unbiased responses about services and project results. Currently, Intellectsoft’s Clutch profile has 20 positive reviews.

Intellectsoft’s most recent 5-star Clutch review comes from a Senior Manager at a New York-based consulting firm. The client approached us with a need for a new project management web application. They were interested in a comprehensive solution, from UI/UX design to end-to-end development. The app fulfilled the mission: the client manages their workplace workflow efficiently with the app we created. The application was also well-received by users.

The reviewer shared the following praise in their Clutch review:

“Intellectsoft struck an excellent balance in their work. Their team is talented, responsive, and produced a high-quality product. We appreciate the skill with which they tackled the objective we lacked the resources to execute in-house.”

With over ten years of development experience, we are ready to tackle any challenge that comes our way. We’re happy to see our hard work pay off on Clutch, and we look forward to being featured as a UK leader again next year!

excerpt.rendered: Intellectsoft earns top spots in six Clutch ratings.
